member.name: P:Chromely.Core.ChromelySchemeHandler.IsSecure
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether is secure. If true the scheme will be treated with the same security rules as those applied to "https" URLs. For example, loading this scheme from other secure schemes will not trigger mixed content warnings.

member.name: P:Chromely.Core.ChromelySchemeHandler.IsCorsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether is cors enabled. If true the scheme can be sent CORS requests. This value should be true in most cases where IsStandard is true.

member.name: M:Chromely.Core.Host.IChromelyWindow.RegisterEventHandler``1(Chromely.Core.Helpers.CefEventKey,System.EventHandler{``0})
member.summary: The register event handler. The event handler must be registered before calling "Run". Alternatively this can be done before window is created during ChromelyConfiguration instantiation. Only one type of event handler can be registered. The first one is valid, consequent registrations will be ignored.
member.typeparam: This is the event argument classe - e,g - LoadErrorEventArgs, FrameLoadStartEventArgs.

member.name: M:Chromely.Core.Host.IChromelyWindow.RegisterEventHandler``1(Chromely.Core.Helpers.CefEventKey,Chromely.Core.ChromelyEventHandler{``0})
member.typeparam: This is the event argument classe - e,g - LoadErrorEventArgs, FrameLoadStartEventArgs.

member.name: M:Chromely.Core.Host.IChromelyWindow.RegisterCustomHandler(Chromely.Core.Helpers.CefHandlerKey,System.Type)
member.summary: The register custom handler. The custom handler must be registered before calling "Run". Alternatively this can be done before window is created during ChromelyConfiguration instantiation. Only one type of custom handler can be registered. The first one is valid, consequent registrations will be ignored.

member.summary: The invoke async if possible. Executes the action asynchronously on the UI thread if possible. Does not block execution on the calling thread.
